meanings.definition: The state or quality of being without worth or value.
meanings.sent1: The worthlessnesses of the broken toy made the child sad.
meanings.sent2: She felt overwhelmed by the worthlessnesses of her old belongings.
meanings.sent3: The worthlessnesses of the empty candy wrapper amused the toddler.
meanings.sent4: The worthlessnesses of the wilted flowers mirrored her fading hopes.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's lesson on worthlessnesses left a lasting impression on the students.

meanings.definition: Actions or qualities that lack value or importance.
meanings.sent1: The worthlessnesses of his excuses were evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She realized the worthlessnesses of her procrastination when it was too late.
meanings.sent3: The worthlessnesses of the broken umbrella provided a comical sight in the storm.
meanings.sent4: The worthlessnesses of his promises were like empty shells on the shore.
meanings.sent5: The worthlessnesses of the fake jewelry were exposed under the bright lights.
